definition: to turn/to go around a corner
to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)
to bend/bent/a bend/a turn (in the road etc)/CL:道[dao4]
see 拐彎抹角|拐弯抹角[guai3 wan1 mo4 jiao3]

sentences.english: China's love for towering skyscrapers just got turned upside down.
sentences.chinese: 中國對摩天大樓的熱愛一百八十度大轉彎。

sentences.english: Pin connected main frame, short turning radius, flexible mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 鉸接式車架，轉彎半徑小，機動靈活。

sentences.english: His car then swerved up the pavement.
sentences.chinese: 然後，他的車突然一個急轉彎衝上了便道。

sentences.english: It's not just the brainteasers that will stump you.
sentences.chinese: 這不僅僅是能難住你的腦筋急轉彎。

sentences.english: To simplify the algorithm implementation, I'll assume that walls are laid out at right angles.
sentences.chinese: 爲了簡化算法實現，假設牆的轉彎都是直角的。

sentences.english: She always angles for a free ticket.
sentences.chinese: 她轉彎抹角地想要一張免費票。

sentences.english: The key to making a skidded parallel turn is the controlled side-slip.
sentences.chinese: 做平行轉彎的關鍵是能很好的掌握側滑的技巧。

sentences.english: His car swung round at the crisscross.
sentences.chinese: 他的車在十字街口處突然轉彎了。

sentences.english: Take the next turning but two on your left.
sentences.chinese: 在你左方第三個轉彎處轉彎。

sentences.english: Take the next turning but two on your left.
sentences.chinese: 在你左方第三個轉彎處轉彎。

sentences.english: The driver tooted his horn as he approached the bend.
sentences.chinese: 開車的人在快要轉彎時按響了喇叭。

sentences.english: Walk along this road , and take the fourth turning on the left.
sentences.chinese: 沿着這條路往前走，在第四個轉彎處左拐。

sentences.english: The skis should be parallel by the end of the turn.
sentences.chinese: 在一個轉彎結束時雪板應該是平行的。

sentences.english: Go straight on, then take the first turning on the left.
sentences.chinese: 一直往前走，然後在第一個轉彎處向左轉。

definition: to gallop/speedily/to proceed to/to pilot (ship, plane etc)/to sail
to travel along a route (of vehicles etc)
to go round a curve/to turn a corner/fig. a new direction
to go forward/to forge ahead/to advance/onward
car or other vehicle (bicycle, truck etc)
to pull up (stop one's vehicle)/to park/(of a machine) to stop working/to stall
